fields.name: account
fields.description: The signer capability corresponding to the account that the resource is on.

fields.name: aggregatorAddr
fields.description: Address of the aggregator that is adding a new job.

fields.name: jobAddr
fields.description: Address of the job that is being added to an aggregator.

fields.name: weight
fields.description: The job weight used when an oracle calculated the weighted median for its final response.

fields.name: aggregatorAddr
fields.description: Address of the aggregator that is being locked.

types.name: AggregatorOpenRoundParams
types.description: Call OpenRound on an aggregator and request a new value from a batch of oracles.

fields.name: aggregatorAddr
fields.description: Address of the aggregator that is requesting a new value.

fields.name: jitter
fields.description: Pseudorandom value added to next aggregator update time.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource belongs to.

fields.name: batchSize
fields.description: Number of oracles assigned to an update request.

fields.name: reward
fields.description: Rewards to provide oracles and round openers on this queue.

fields.name: aggregatorAddr
fields.description: Address of aggregator that is removing a job.

fields.name: jobAddr
fields.description: Address of job account that is being removed from an aggregator.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource belongs to.

fields.name: crankAddr
fields.description: Address of the crank being popped.

fields.name: popIdx
fields.description: Index of the element to pop on the crank.

fields.name: crankAddr
fields.description: Address of crank for which aggregator will be pushed onto.

fields.name: aggregatorAddr
fields.description: Address of aggregator being added to a crank.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the job stored on-chain.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Metadata of the job to store on-chain.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for making changes.

fields.name: data
fields.description: The serialized `OracleJob`.

fields.name: aggregatorAddr
fields.description: Address of the aggregator that is receiving funds in it's lease account.

fields.name: loadAmount
fields.description: Amount being added to an aggregator's lease.

fields.name: aggregatorAddr
fields.description: Address of the aggregator to initialize a lease for.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource belongs to.

fields.name: withdrawAuthority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for withdrawing funds.

fields.name: initialAmount
fields.description: Amount to load onto a lease during initialization.

fields.name: aggregatorAddr
fields.description: Address of aggregator that is setting a lease authority for.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource belongs to.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for making changes.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource belongs to.

fields.name: oracleAddr
fields.description: Address of oracle that is heartbeating on-chain to signal readiness.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the oracle to store on-chain.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Metadata of the oracle to store on-chain.

fields.name: oracleAuthority
fields.description: Account delegated as the authority.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource belongs to.

fields.name: oracleAddr
fields.description: Address of oracle that is changing it's config.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the oracle stored on-chain.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Metadata of the oracle to store on-chain.

fields.name: oracleAuthority
fields.description: Account that is the authority for the oracle.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource will belong to.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for making changes.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the oracle queue to store on-chain.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Metadata of the oracle queue to store on-chain.

fields.name: reward
fields.description: Rewards to provide oracles and round openers on this queue.

fields.name: minStake
fields.description: The minimum amount of stake oracles must present to remain on the queue.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for making changes.

fields.name: reward
fields.description: Rewards to provide oracles and round openers on this queue.

fields.name: minStake
fields.description: The minimum amount of stake oracles must present to remain on the queue.

fields.name: oracleAddr
fields.description: Address of oracle that will be receiving funds into it's token wallet.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource belongs to.

fields.name: loadAmount
fields.description: Amount of funds to transfer into the oracle's token wallet.

fields.name: oracleAddr
fields.description: Address of oracle that a token wallet is being initialized for.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource belongs to.

fields.name: withdrawAuthority
fields.description: Address of account that is delegated as the authority to approve withdraws.

fields.name: oracleAddr
fields.description: Address of oracle that will remove funds from it's token wallet.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource belongs to.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Amount of funds to withdraw.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for the granter..

fields.name: granter
fields.description: Address of account that will be granting permissions to the grantee.

fields.name: grantee
fields.description: Address of account that will be be granted permissions from the granter.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for the granter.

fields.name: granter
fields.description: Address of oracle queue that is granting permissions to use its resources.

fields.name: grantee
fields.description: Address of account that is being assigned permissions to use a granters resources.

fields.name: permission
fields.description: Permissions being assigned to a resource. See [SwitchboardPermission](/aptos/idl/types/SwitchboardPermission) for enumerations and their descriptions.

fields.name: enable
fields.description: Flag dictating whether permissions are being enabled or disabled.

fields.name: oracleAddress
fields.description: Address of oracle that removed funds from their wallet.

fields.name: destinationWallet
fields.description: Wallet that received funds from the oracle's wallet.

fields.name: previousAmount
fields.description: Amount before the withdraw.

fields.name: newAmount
fields.description: Amount after the withdraw.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Unix timestamp of the withdraw.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Maintains the current update count.

fields.name: roundOpenTimestamp
fields.description: Maintains the time that the round was opened at.

fields.name: roundOpenBlockHeight
fields.description: Maintain the blockheight at the time that the round was opened.

fields.name: result
fields.description: Maintains the current median of all successful round responses.

fields.name: stdDeviation
fields.description: Standard deviation of the accepted results in the round.

fields.name: minResponse
fields.description: Maintains the minimum node response this round.

fields.name: maxResponse
fields.description: Maintains the maximum node response this round.

fields.name: oracleKeys
fields.description: Pubkeys of the oracles fulfilling this round.

fields.name: medians
fields.description: Represents all successful node responses this round. `NaN` if empty.

fields.name: currentPayout
fields.description: Current rewards/slashes oracles have received this round.

fields.name: errorsFulfilled
fields.description: Maintains whether the oracle assigned at the specific index failed to fulfill a round response.

fields.name: numSuccess
fields.description: Maintains the number of successful responses received from nodes. Nodes can submit one successful response per round.

fields.name: numError
fields.description: Maintains the number of failed responses from the oracles.

fields.name: isClosed
fields.description: Maintains whether or not the round is closed.

fields.name: roundConfirmedTimestamp
fields.description: Maintains the round close timestamp.

types.name: Aggregator
types.description: Resource storing the top level fields for a Switchboard aggregator

fields.name: signerCap
fields.description: The signer capability corresponding to the account that the resource is on.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for making account changes or withdrawing funds from a lease.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the aggregator to store on-chain.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Metadata of the aggregator to store on-chain.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: Unix timestamp when the aggregator was created.

fields.name: isLocked
fields.description: Flag for whether an aggregators configuration is locked for editing.

fields.name: _ebuf
fields.description: Reserved.

types.name: AggregatorConfig
types.description: Resource storing the configuration for a Switchboard aggregator

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the queue the aggregator belongs to.

fields.name: batchSize
fields.description: Number of oracles assigned to an update request.

fields.name: minOracleResults
fields.description: Minimum number of oracle responses required before a round is validated.

fields.name: minUpdateDelaySeconds
fields.description: Minimum number of seconds required between aggregator rounds.

fields.name: historyLimit
fields.description: The maximum number of historical samples that will be stored with the aggregator before being overwritten in a round-robin fashion.

fields.name: varianceThreshold
fields.description: Change percentage required between a previous round and the current round. If variance percentage is not met, reject new oracle responses.

fields.name: forceReportPeriod
fields.description: Number of seconds for which, even if the variance threshold is not passed, accept new responses from oracles.

fields.name: minJobResults
fields.description: Minimum number of job results before an oracle accepts a result.

fields.name: expiration
fields.description: Timestamp when the feed is no longer needed.

fields.name: crankAddr
fields.description: Optional, address of the crank the aggregator is currently using. Event based feeds do not need a crank.

fields.name: crankDisabled
fields.description: Flag dictating whether pushing to a crank is disabled.

fields.name: crankRowCount
fields.description: The current index of the aggregator on the crank.

fields.name: nextAllowedUpdateTime
fields.description: Unix timestamp when the next update request will be available.

fields.name: consecutiveFailureCount
fields.description: Counter for the number of consecutive failures before a feed is removed from a queue. If set to 0, failed feeds will remain on the queue.

fields.name: startAfter
fields.description: Unix timestamp when open round calls will be considered valid.

fields.name: varianceThreshold
fields.description: Change percentage required between a previous round and the current round. If variance percentage is not met, reject new oracle responses.

fields.name: forceReportPeriod
fields.description: Number of seconds for which, even if the variance threshold is not passed, accept new responses from oracles.

fields.name: minJobResults
fields.description: Minimum number of job results before an oracle accepts a result.

fields.name: expiration
fields.description: Timestamp when the feed is no longer needed.

fields.name: readCharge
fields.description: The cost to read a data feed.

fields.name: rewardEscrow
fields.description: The account address that will receive any funds incurred from setting a `readCharge`.

fields.name: readWhitelist
fields.description: Optional, account addresses permitted to read a data feed.

fields.name: limitReadsToWhitelist
fields.description: Flag dictating whether a feed permits public reads.

types.name: AggregatorHistoryData
types.description: Resource storing the historic samples for a Switchboard aggregator.

fields.name: history
fields.description: Array of historical samples for confirmed values.

fields.name: historyWriteIdx
fields.description: Tracks the current array index to write new samples on-chain.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The result of the sample.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: The unix timestamp when the sample was requested from a batch of oracles.

fields.name: roundId
fields.description: The round ID when the sample was recorded.

fields.name: addr
fields.description: Address of the aggregator resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the aggregator to store on-chain.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Metadata of the aggregator to store on-chain.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource belongs to.

fields.name: crankAddr
fields.description: Optional, address of the crank that will periodically trigger `AggregatorOpenRound` calls to request an update from a batch of oracles.

fields.name: batchSize
fields.description: Number of oracles assigned to an update request.

fields.name: minOracleResults
fields.description: Minimum number of oracle responses required before a round is validated.

fields.name: minJobResults
fields.description: Minimum number of job results before an oracle accepts a result.

fields.name: minUpdateDelaySeconds
fields.description: Minimum number of seconds required between aggregator rounds.

fields.name: startAfter
fields.description: Unix timestamp when open round calls will be considered valid.

fields.name: varianceThreshold
fields.description: Change percentage required between a previous round and the current round. If variance percentage is not met, reject new oracle responses.

fields.name: forceReportPeriod
fields.description: Number of seconds for which, even if the variance threshold is not passed, accept new responses from oracles.

fields.name: expiration
fields.description: Timestamp when the feed is no longer needed.

fields.name: disableCrank
fields.description: Flag dictating whether pushing to a crank is disabled.

fields.name: historyLimit
fields.description: The maximum number of historical samples that will be stored with the aggregator before being overwritten in a round-robin fashion.

fields.name: readCharge
fields.description: The cost to read a data feed.

fields.name: rewardEscrow
fields.description: The account address that will receive any funds incurred from setting a `readCharge`.

fields.name: readWhitelist
fields.description: Optional, account addresses permitted to read a data feed.

fields.name: limitReadsToWhitelist
fields.description: Flag dictating whether a feed permits public reads.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for making changes.

fields.name: heap
fields.description: The array of elements stored on the crank.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource belongs to.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: Unix timestamp when the resource was created.

fields.name: _ebuf
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: Unix timestamp when the resource was created.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for making changes.

fields.name: _ebuf
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: addr
fields.description: Address of the job account resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the job to store on-chain.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Metadata of the job to store on-chain.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for making changes.

fields.name: expiration
fields.description: Timestamp when the feed is no longer needed.

fields.name: hash
fields.description: Hash of the job account to prevent malicous RPC nodes from providing an incorrect job definition.

fields.name: data
fields.description: The serialized `OracleJob`.

fields.name: referenceCount
fields.description: The number of aggregators currently referencing this job.

fields.name: totalSpent
fields.description: The total amount spent on leases associated with this job.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: Unix timestamp when the resource was created.

fields.name: _ebuf
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for making changes.

fields.name: queueAddr
fields.description: Address of the oracle queue that the resource belongs to.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the oracle stored on-chain.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Optional, metadata for the oracle stored on-chain.

fields.name: signerCap
fields.description: The signer capability corresponding to the account that the resource is on.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: Unix timestamp when the resource was created.

fields.name: _ebuf
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: consecutiveSuccess
fields.description: Number of consecutive successful update request.

fields.name: consecutiveError
fields.description: Number of consecutive update request that resulted in an error

fields.name: consecutiveDisagreement
fields.description: Number of consecutive update request that resulted in a disagreement with the accepted median result.

fields.name: consecutiveLateResponse
fields.description: Number of consecutive update request that were posted on-chain late and not included in an accepted result.

fields.name: consecutiveFailure
fields.description: Number of consecutive update request that resulted in a failure.

fields.name: totalSuccess
fields.description: Total number of successful update request.

fields.name: totalError
fields.description: Total number of update request that resulted in an error.

fields.name: totalDisagreement
fields.description: Total number of update request that resulted in a disagreement with the accepted median result.

fields.name: totalLateResponse
fields.description: Total number of update request that were posted on-chain late and not included in an accepted result.

fields.name: data
fields.description: Array of oracle addresses that are currently heartbeating on-chain.

fields.name: currIdx
fields.description: Current index of the oracle rotation.

fields.name: gcIdx
fields.description: Garbage collection index.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for making changes.

fields.name: reward
fields.description: Rewards to provide oracles and round openers on this queue.

fields.name: slashingEnabled
fields.description: Flag dictating whether slashing is enabled on this queue.

fields.name: unpermissionedFeedsEnabled
fields.description: Enabling this setting means data feeds do not need explicit permission to join the queue and request new values from its oracles.

fields.name: varianceToleranceMultiplier
fields.description: The tolerated variance amount oracle results can have from the accepted round result before being slashed.

fields.name: oracleTimeout
fields.description: Time period we should remove an oracle after if no response.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the queue to store on-chain.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Metadata of the queue to store on-chain.

fields.name: feedProbationPeriod
fields.description: After a feed lease is funded or re-funded, it must consecutively succeed N amount of times or its authorization to use the queue is auto-revoked.

fields.name: consecutiveFeedFailureLimit
fields.description: Consecutive failure limit for a feed before feed permission is revoked.

fields.name: consecutiveOracleFailureLimit
fields.description: Consecutive failure limit for an oracle before oracle permission is revoked.

fields.name: unpermissionedVrfEnabled
fields.description: Not used on Aptos.

fields.name: lockLeaseFunding
fields.description: Prevent new leases from being funded n this queue. Useful to turn down a queue for migrations, since authority is always immutable.

fields.name: enableBufferRelayers
fields.description: Not used on Aptos.

fields.name: minStake
fields.description: The minimum amount of stake oracles must present to remain on the queue.

fields.name: maxSize
fields.description: Maximum number of oracles a queue can support.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: Unix timestamp when the resource was created.

fields.name: _ebuf
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: The account delegated as the authority for making changes.

fields.name: permissions
fields.description: The SwitchboardPermission enumeration assigned by the `granter` to the `grantee`.

fields.name: granter
fields.description: Address of the account that is granting permissions to use its resources.

fields.name: grantee
fields.description: Address of the account that is being granted permissions to use a granter's resources.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: Unix timestamp when the resource was created.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: Unix timestamp when the permissions were last updated.

fields.name: _ebuf
fields.description: Reserved.

types.name: SwitchboardDecimal
types.description: A struct representing a floating point number on-chain.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The part of a floating-point number that represents the significant digits of that number, and that is multiplied by the base, 10, raised to the power of scale to give the actual value of the number.

fields.name: dec
fields.description: The number of decimal places to move to the left to yield the actual value.

fields.name: neg
fields.description: Flag dictating whether the value is negative.
